result.ga: Is maith liom a bheith ag iascach
result.orig: Is maith liom a bheith ag iascach
result.html: Is maith liom a bheith ag iascachI like fishing.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom a ḃeiṫ ag iascaċI like fishing.

result.html: Bainim an-sásamh as an iascachI really enjoy fishing.
result.ponchtml: Bainim an-sásaṁ as an iascaċI really enjoy fishing.
